pages.text: Affects all non-healing spells. Affected spells cooldown increased by 50% and mana cost increased 20%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_redemption)Path of Redemption$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter has become bound to the mission of healing, forsaking other types of magic. Imbues onto the Scepter of the Pacifist and persists on the Path of Redemption
